Respons Menteri PPPA Soal Pernyataan Seksime Kapolri
03 Nov 2019, 11:24 by , https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


Merespons pernyataan bernada seksisme Kapolri Idham Aziz, Menteri PPPA I Gusti Ayu Bintang Darmawati Puspayoga ingatkan pentingnya kesetaraan gender.(ANTARA FOTO/Wahyu Putro A)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia -- Menteri Pemberdayaan Perempuan dan Perlindungan Anak (PPPA) I Gusti Ayu Bintang Darmawati Puspayoga menekankan pentingnya kesetaraan gender dalam berbagai sektor. Hal itu ia sampaikan merespons pernyataan bernada seksisme dari Kepala Kepolisian RI Jenderal Idham Azis.Sesaat sebelum menjalani uji kepatutan dan kelayakan calon kapolri di Komisi III DPR RI, Idham berujar tak ingin pekerjaannya dicampuri anak dan istrinya. Ia bahkan menyebut tugas istri hanya mengurus dapur, sumur, dan kasur."Itu kan mulai dari awal, mungkin ya kalau sekarang kita harus berpikir ke depan bagaimana kesetaraan gender itu dapat diwujudkan," kata Bintang saat ditemui di HUT ke-55 Tahun Parisadha Buddha Dharma Niciren Syosyu Indonesia (NSI) di Kantor Kementerian Agama, Jakarta, Minggu (3/11).Bintang berkata Kementerian PPPA mengusung lima target untuk mengangkat derajat perempuan. Pertama adalah pemberdayaan perempuan di bidang wirausaha. Kemudian mengefektifkan peran perempuan dalam pendidikan anak.Lalu Kementerian PPPA bakal berusaha menurunkan tingkat kekerasan terhadap perempuan dan anak. Keempat menekan angka pekerja anak dan kelima mencegah pernikahan dini."Ke depan justru bagaimana kita bisa memberdayakan perempuan tidak hanya urusan domestik saja, tetapi bisa jadi penopang keluarga dalam bidang ekonomi," ujar dia.Sebelumnya, Kapolri Jenderal Idham Azis menyampaikan beberapa janji saat ditemui perwakilan Komisi III DPR RI di kediamannya Jalan Panglima Polim III Nomor 7A, Jakarta Selatan pada Rabu (30/10).Dia berjanji akan mengurangi pertemuan dengan anggota di rumah dinas Kapolri bila kelak terpilih dan dilantik. Idham juga tak ingin istrinyaÂ ikut campur dalam urusan pekerjaannya."Saya selalu bilang sama istri, kamu urusnya di dapur, sumur, sama kasur saja. Kalau tidak pakai prinsip itu, lama-lama istri bisa jadi bintang empat setengah. Terus lama lama bisa bintang tujuh, obat sakit kepala itu," kata Idham sembari bercanda.(dhf/chs)

PPPA Minister's Response to the Sexime Police Chief's Statement
03 Nov 2019, 11:24 by, https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


Responding to the statement about the sexism of the National Police Chief Idham Aziz, PPPA Minister I Gusti Ayu Bintang Darmawati Puspayoga reminded the importance of gender equality. (ANTARA PHOTO / Wahyu Putro A)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia - Minister of Women Empowerment and Child Protection (PPPA) I Gusti Ayu Bintang Darmawati Puspayoga stressed the importance of gender equality in various sectors. He said that in response to the statement about the sexism of the Indonesian National Police Chief, General Idham Azis. Shortly before undergoing a fit and proper test of candidates for the police chief in Commission III of the Indonesian House of Representatives, Idham said he did not want his work to be interfered by his children and wife. He even said that his wife's task was only to take care of the kitchen, wells and mattresses. "That starts from the beginning, maybe yes if now we have to think ahead how gender equality can be realized," Bintang said when met at the 55th Anniversary of Parisadha Buddha Dharma Niciren Syosyu Indonesia (NSI) at the Office of the Ministry of Religion, Jakarta, Sunday (3/11). Bintang said that the PPPA Ministry is carrying five targets to elevate women. First is the empowerment of women in the field of entrepreneurship. Then streamlining the role of women in children's education. Then the Ministry of PPPA will try to reduce the level of violence against women and children. Fourth suppresses the number of child laborers and fifth prevents early marriage. "In the future it is precisely how we can empower women not only in domestic matters, but can be a family support in the economic field," he said. Previously, National Police Chief General Idham Azis delivered several promises when met House of Representatives Commission III representative at his residence Jalan Panglima Polim III Number 7A, South Jakarta on Wednesday (10/30). He promised to reduce the meeting with members in the Kapolri official residence if later elected and appointed. Idham also does not want his wife to interfere in his work affairs. "I always say to my wife, you take care of it in the kitchen, the well, just the mattress. If you don't use that principle, your wife will eventually become a four and a half star. seven, the headache medicine, "Idham said while joking. (dhf / chs)
